Date: Tuesday, 5/9/1990
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Charlie Leibrandt

Date: Saturday, 6/3/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Dave Sax

Date: Thursday, 6/15/1990
Subject: Progress of Fernando Hernandez
Dear Sir,
Fernando Hernandez has nothing more to prove at A Mobile Bay Bears!
He has an ERA of 3.67 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/17/1990

Regards,
Pedro Guerrero
